biotools.summary:
Open-Source Sensing Platform to Monitor the Dynamic Responses of Plants.

Open-source release of code and PCB-design files of the Gloxinia platform.

If you use this code for a scientific publication, please consider citing our paper Gloxinia—An Open-Source Sensing Platform to Monitor the Dynamic Responses of Plants.
